rule.name: RC_ER_GetMaestraDireccionesNoSBGM
rule.description: Query que retorna los datos de la maestra de direcciones No SBGM
rule.definition: with( local!batchsize: 100, local!totalCount: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryEntity_v1"( entity: #"_a-0000e480-7e67-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_8433209", query: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_query"( logicalexpression: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryLogicalExpression"( operator: "AND", filters: { #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"( field: "Id", operator: "in", value: ri!Ids ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"( field: "Direccion", operator: "=", value: ri!Direccion ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"( field: "IdPais", operator: "in", value: ri!IdPais ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"( field: "ctlEstado", operator: "=", value: ri!Estado ) }, ignoreFiltersWithEmptyValues: true ), pagingInfo: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_pagingInfo"( startIndex: 1, batchSize: 1 ) ), fetchTotalCount: true ).totalCount, local!numOfQueriesDecimal: local!totalCount/local!batchsize, local!numOfQueries: if( mod(local!numOfQueriesDecimal, 1) = 0, tointeger(local!numOfQueriesDecimal), tointeger(rounddown(local!numOfQueriesDecimal,0)) + 1 ), local!pagingInfo: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"( enumerate(local!numOfQueries), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_pagingInfo"( startIndex: fv!item * local!batchsize + 1, batchSize: local!batchsize ) ), local!query: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"( local!pagingInfo, #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryEntity_v1"( entity: #"_a-0000e480-7e67-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_8433209", query: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_query"( logicalexpression: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryLogicalExpression"( operator: "AND", filters: { #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"( field: "Id", operator: "in", value: ri!Ids ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"( field: "Direccion", operator: "=", value: ri!Direccion ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"( field: "IdPais", operator: "in", value: ri!IdPais ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"( field: "ctlEstado", operator: "=", value: ri!Estado ) }, ignoreFiltersWithEmptyValues: true ), pagingInfo: fv!item ) ).data ), todatasubset(a!flatten(local!query)) )
